scripts.demo:week3: npm run build && npm run demo:weekly && echo 'Week 3 demo complete. Run: node scripts/replay-metrics.mjs dist/weekly-demo/export.json'
scripts.verify:weekly: npm run build && npm run replay:gate && npm run test:e2e:weekly && npm run demo:weekly && npm run check:concept-map && npm run gate:weekly:acceptance && npm run gate:textbook:content && npm run gate:week3:acceptance
scripts.gate:weekly:acceptance: cd dist/weekly-demo && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="hint_view") | .hintLevel] | max == 3' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="hint_view") | has("hintId")] | any == false' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | has("sessionId") and (.sessionId!="")] | all == true' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="hint_view") | (has("sqlEngageSubtype") and has("sqlEngageRowId") and has("policyVersion") and (.sqlEngageSubtype!="") and (.sqlEngageRowId!="") and (.policyVersion!="")) ] | all == true' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="explanation_view")] | length >= 1' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="hint_view" or .eventType=="explanation_view")] | length >= 4' export.json
scripts.gate:textbook:content: cd dist/weekly-demo && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="textbook_add")] | length >= 1' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="textbook_add") | has("noteTitle") and (.noteTitle!="") and (.noteTitle!=null)] | all' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="textbook_add") | has("noteContent") and (.noteContent!="") and (.noteContent!=null)] | all' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="textbook_add") | has("conceptIds") and (.conceptIds | length > 0)] | all' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="textbook_add") | has("evidenceInteractionIds") and (.evidenceInteractionIds | length > 0)] | all' export.json
scripts.gate:week3:acceptance: cd dist/weekly-demo && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="guidance_view") | .rung] | max == 3' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="guidance_escalate")] | length >= 2' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="textbook_unit_upsert")] | length >= 1' export.json && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="source_view")] | length >= 1' export.json
scripts.gate:week3:groundedness: cd dist/weekly-demo && jq -e '[.interactions[] | select(.eventType=="guidance_view" and .rung >= 2) | .grounded] | (map(select(. == true)) | length) / length >= 0.5' export.json
